import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { User } from 'src/app/interfaces';
import { TokenService } from 'src/app/services/token.service';
import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service';
import Swal from 'sweetalert2';
import { Router } from '@angular/router';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-nav',
  templateUrl: './nav.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./nav.component.scss']
})
export class NavComponent implements OnInit {

  constructor(private userService: UserService, private tokenService: TokenService, private router: Router) { }

  public user: User;
  public userId: string;

  ngOnInit(): void {
    this.findUser();
  }



  findUser() {
    this.userId = localStorage.getItem('user');
    this.userService.findUserById(this.userId).subscribe(res => {
      if (res.user) {
        this.user = res.user;
      }

    });
  }

  logout() {
    this.tokenService.logout();
  }

  checkIfLoggedOrNot() {
    if (!localStorage.getItem('user')) {
      Swal.fire("You must be logged in to access the forum");


    } else {
      this.router.navigateByUrl("forum");
    }
  }
}

<nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg">
    <a class="navbar-brand" href="#">
        <img src="../../../assets/logoOhayo.png" class="logo">
    </a>
    <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#navbarColor01"
        aria-controls="navbarColor01" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Toggle navigation">
        <span class="navbar-toggler-icon "><i class="fas fa-bars my-auto"></i></span>
    </button>

    <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarColor01">
        <ul class="navbar-nav mr-auto">
            <li class="nav-item " routerLinkActive="active">
                <a class="nav-link" routerLink="/home">Home</a>
            </li>
            <li class="nav-item" routerLinkActive="active">
                <a class="nav-link" routerLink="/anime">Anime</a>
            </li>
            <li class="nav-item" routerLinkActive="active">
                <a class="nav-link" routerLink="/manga"><span class="sr-only">(current)</span>Manga</a>
            </li>
            <li class="nav-item" routerLinkActive="active">
                <a class="nav-link" style="cursor: pointer;" (click)="checkIfLoggedOrNot()">Forum</a>
            </li>
        </ul>
        <ul class="navbar-nav">
            <li *ngIf="user" class="nav-item">
                <div class="dropdown profile">
                    <button class="btn btn-none dropdown-toggle dropProfile" type="button" id="dropdownMenuButton"
                        data-toggle="dropdown" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false">
                        {{user.username}}
                    </button>
                    <div class="dropdown-menu">
                        <a class="dropdown-item" routerLink="/profile"> <i class="far fa-user mr-2"></i>Profile</a>

                        <a class="dropdown-item drop" (click)="logout()"><i
                                class="fas fa-sign-out-alt mr-2"></i>Logout</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li>
            <li *ngIf="!user" class="nav-item">
                <a class="nav-link" routerLink="/signin">Sign in</a>
            </li>
            <li *ngIf="!user" class="nav-item">
                <a class="nav-link" routerLink="/signup">Sign up</a>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</nav>
